page.name: Bos Primigenius
page.description: If you're going to take the bull by the horns, you're not going to have a free hand to hold this axe.  Choose wisely.  This weapon requires a Dragon Amulet.

properties.name: Bos Primigenius
properties.description: If you're going to take the bull by the horns, you're not going to have a free hand to hold this axe.  Choose wisely.  This weapon requires a Dragon Amulet.

page.name: (Mino)torture
page.description: Not even string can help you find your way out of THIS labyrinth. The minotaur who built it wanted to confound any and all intruders, and make it impossible for even the cleverest hero to get out without good deal of luck and persistance.

properties.complete: I wonder if the metal in those shackles would make good weaponry?
